mapper.select: select op_num from `option` where op_gd_num = #{option.op_gd_num} and op_size = #{option.op_size}
select * from goods join `option` on gd_num = op_gd_num where op_num = #{orderList.ol_op_num}
select sum(gd_price * #{orderList.ol_amount}) from goods join `option` on gd_num = op_gd_num where op_num = #{orderList.ol_op_num}
mapper.insert: insert into `order` (or_name, or_address, or_address_detail, or_postnum, or_phone, or_me_email) values (#{order.or_name}, #{order.or_address}, #{order.or_address_detail}, #{order.or_postnum}, #{order.or_phone}, #{order.or_me_email})
insert into orderlist (ol_op_num, ol_or_num, ol_total_price, ol_amount) values (#{orderList.ol_op_num}, #{orderList.ol_or_num}, #{orderList.ol_total_price}, #{orderList.ol_amount})
mapper.select: select * from `order` join orderlist on or_num = ol_or_num where or_me_email = #{user.me_email} and or_date >= date_add(now(), interval - 1 month) order by or_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from orderList where ol_num = #{orderList.ol_num} and ol_state = '주문완료'
mapper.update: update orderlist set ol_state = #{orderList.ol_state} where ol_num = #{orderList.ol_num}
